text: Charles Frazier Stanley (September 25, 1932 - April 18, 2023) was an American religious leader who as the pastor of megachurch First Baptist Church Atlanta in Atlanta, Georgia. He was the starter and president of "In Touch Ministries". Stanley also served two terms as president of the Southern Baptist Convention from 1984 through 1986. He was born in Dry Fork, Virginia.
